poem:
### Ego and Ambition 

In the shadowed past's raucous light,   
a man presses forward, his desires  
as untamed fields—ploughed by applause  
and quiet defiance. A voice rises  
from metal beasts, seeking the soil's  
politic embrace. Yet beneath,  
what rusting gears of ego grind  
the earth? Only time will hear.
